articles.title: Rupee ends 2022 as worst-performing Asian currency: Report - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The rupee finished the year at 82.72 to the U.S. currency, down from 74.33 at the end of 2021, while the dollar index was headed for its biggest yearly gain since 2015.
articles.content: The Indian rupee ended 2022 as the worst-performing Asian currency with a fall of 10.14%, its biggest annual decline since 2013, as the dollar rocketed on the U.S. Federal Reserve's aggressive moneta… [+1777 chars]

articles.title: Japfa shares tumble 35.5% amid listing of its dairy business in Hong Kong - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Japfa's Indonesia unit was downgraded to ‘B+’ following the distribution in specie of Japfa's shares in AustAsia.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Singapore-listed agri-food group Japfa saw its shares tumble on Friday amid the successful listing of its China-focused dairy business AustAsia Group in Hong Kong.

articles.title: Makeup for a cause: This 26-year-old Singaporean started a cosmetics brand to help save endangered animals - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Stuck in the UK during lockdown at the height of the pandemic, Dazale Choy decided to pursue her twin passions for makeup and animals by launching Endangered Cosmetics.
articles.content:
Growing up, Dazale Choy was passionate about two things: Animals and makeup.
As a child, she would look forward to weekly trips to the zoo to interact with its residents. As a teen, she would create… [+945 chars]
